# Transform vector to (a,b)

Transform vector to (a,b)

## Usage

``` r
transform_alpha(x, a = 0, b = 1)
```

## Arguments

- x:

  vector to transform

- a:

  lower bound of transform

- b:

  upper bound of transform

## Value

transformed vector

## Examples

``` r
transform_alpha(runif(100))
#>   [1] 0.359416881 0.400924060 0.789389904 0.519889466 0.122517877 0.360096833
```
